name: T.I. & Tiny: The Family Hustle
overview: T.I., the Grammy Award-winning artist,  is reunited with his wife, Tameka (a.k.a) Tiny, and his children following a 12 month prison sentence that was completed several months ago.

seasons.name: Season 6
seasons.overview: In season six, T.I. and Tiny continue to work on their relationship as their kids grow older and change every day. Niq Niq is ready to leave the nest, making her the first of the Harris children to move out on their own, while Messiah prepares for his driver's license test. With Deyjah and Domani making the transition to adulthood, Tiny stops them in their tracks by showing them just how difficult being an adult can be. King's a great older brother to Major and decides to take Major under his wing. Major is no longer the baby he used to be and is looking to follow in his father's footsteps with acting.

episodes.name: God, Family, Hustle
episodes.overview: Grammy award winning rapper T.I. "Tip" Harris has been in prison for 11 months. Both he and his dedicated wife Tameka have a lot of catching up to do. Just as things are starting to look up Tameka receives a devastating phone call delaying their reunion and the news is worse than she could have imagined.

episodes.name: Booty Tag
episodes.overview: T.I. is finally back with his family, but getting settled into his routine at home isn't easy. With his first performance days away his family and professional life are clashing! With too many obligations overlapping he's faced with a decision could set him back in a big way.

episodes.name: America's Sweetheart
episodes.overview: Pop music superstar Taylor Swift invites T.I. to perform at her concert in Atlanta. T.I. struggles with the idea that performing with America's sweetheart might ruin his hard core image. On top of that, being in prison has thrown off his performance game. Can he pull it together before the big day? Meanwhile the OMG Girlz prepare for their first concert, and as their manager Tiny's nerves are wrecked! Will all of the work she's put into the group finally pay off, or will they fall flat?

episodes.name: Stacks on Deck
episodes.overview: Tip's son Domani hopes to follow in his dad's footsteps and become a famous rapper. Will his first performance in front of thousands of fans scare him back to reality? Meanwhile Tiny continues to make progress toward owning her own nail salon, but her best friend Shakinah has a few ideas of her own. Can Tiny reject her friend's crazy ideas and still keep their relationship in tact?

episodes.name: I Will Put My Foot On Your Back Pocket
episodes.overview: Tiny and T.I. are back in Los Angeles after their last disastrous trip to the city. Tip's there for work but Tiny and friends are there for play. The girls make a trip to the plastic surgeon but the visit is not exactly what one friend was expecting. A phone call from home puts Tip on the defense as he heads back to Atlanta early.

episodes.name: Bad and Sneaky
episodes.overview: Tip's head explodes when he finds out his youngest daughter Deyjah has a boyfriend. What's worse is that everyone in the family has been keeping it a secret from him! It's time for T.I. to sit the kids down and talk about the birds and bees, but do they already know too much?

episodes.name: King of the House
episodes.overview: T.I. and Tiny's son King has been staying with his grandmother and she's been spoiling him rotten. But when it's time to come home the little guy puts up a big fight, and T.I. and Tiny are faced with trying to discipline their wild child.

episodes.name: Tip Clause
episodes.overview: With Christmas around the corner, Tip decides to teach the children a valuable lesson in charity. While performing a Christmas play for needy kids, the star of the play becomes too shy to perform the part and Tip must teach him a lesson in confidence.

episodes.name: Baby Fever
episodes.overview: With the kids growing up, Tameka is thinking of having another baby. But when Tameka begins sharing her news, the family surprises her with their reaction.

episodes.name: Green Faces
episodes.overview: Domani has lost focus in school because he wants to follow in his father's footsteps as a performer. In order to show Domani the value of good grades, Tip promises him his own music video if his grades improve.

episodes.name: Baby Girl
episodes.overview: With Niq Niq's sixteenth birthday approaching, she only has one thing on her mind - learning how to drive. But teaching Niq Niq to drive only solidifies that she is growing up and Tip isn't ready to let his little girl go. When Tip's overprotective nature starts interfering with Niq Niq's work with the OMG Girlz, Tiny must give Tip a reality check

episodes.name: Sixty Forty
episodes.overview: When Shekinah unveils a new invention that will revolutionize her hair salon, Tiny agrees to go into business with her. Unfortunately the two friends put their venture -- and their relationship -- at risk when they can't agree on how to split up the profit. Meanwhile, Tip heads into the studio to collaborate with Usher on a new record.

episodes.name: Can You Work?
episodes.overview: With the OMG Girlz already in Los Angeles to sign a recording deal, Tiny convinces Tip to take King and Major along to try their hands at acting.

episodes.name: All For One
episodes.overview: In the season finale, Tip is in the final hectic days leading up to the fashion show for his clothing line, AKOO, and realizes he can't do it without the help of his family. Meanwhile, Tameka uses the fashion show as an excuse to set Shekinah up on a blind date.

episodes.name: Family Camping
episodes.overview: TI and Tiny are back! This family is no stranger to life's greatest adventures. From being on top of the music scene, red carpet events, raising six kids and even time spent in prison, they've survived it all. But can the Harris family overcome their hardest challenge to date? Find out, in the second season opener as the family heads to the wilderness for some good ole fashion family camping.

episodes.name: Birthday Bash
episodes.overview: What do Usher, Nelly, Kelly Rowland, and Lil" Wayne all have in common? They're all performing at this Summer's hottest hip hop concert, and for the first time since his prison release TI is headlining. Can he tackle the pressure of the big stage after after being away for so long? Also, Tameka has a surprise for TI he won't soon forget.

episodes.name: Harris Proof
episodes.overview: Tameka's talk show was picked up and the ladies are getting ready for production but Tameka's best friend Shekinah is feeling out of the loop and believes she can add a perspective the other women can't. Forced to prove herself, Shekinah hits the streets of Atlanta looking women who work hard and keep it real. But can Shekinah's real talk with real women win Tameka over and a spot on the show?

episodes.name: Bitter Sweet 16
episodes.overview: T.I. and Tiny's oldest daughter Niq Niq is turning 16 and TI wants to throw her the party of the year. But, when it comes time for Niq Niq to get her dream car, Tip has other plans.

episodes.name: Windy City Hustle
episodes.overview: As T.I.goes around Chicago to promote his upcoming album, Tiny and Shekinah scour the town in search of an icon.

episodes.name: Who's The Boss?
episodes.overview: After seeing T.I. on the set of a popular television series, Domani is convinced acting is easy. Wanting to teach his young son a lesson prompts T.I. to encourage his children to make their own movie.

episodes.name: Harris Family Fitness Challenge
episodes.overview: After catching his family eating junk food, Tip decides it's time for them to get in shape! With money on the line, Tameka, Shekinah and the kids are put to the test, but Shekinah's desire to win leads her to do the unthinkable, possibly putting her out of the competition altogether.

episodes.name: Bucket List
episodes.overview: Wanting to grab life by the horns Tameka and Shekinah set out to cross life-long dreams off their bucket list...that is until they come across an unpredictable creature that makes them thinks twice. Tip notices the kids are missing out on certain skills best gotten from his old neighborhood. Trying to toughen them up they hit the boxing gym where Major tries to take on his older brother.

episodes.name: Family Pet
episodes.overview: After King's pet hamster passes away the kids beg Tip for a dog only he's unwilling to bring another animal into the home. But when Tameka makes an interesting offer on behalf of the children, Tip puts the kids through a test to see if they are responsible enough for a dog.

episodes.name: Plastic Surgery
episodes.overview: Finally fed up with being overweight and out of shape, Shekinah decides to go under the knife. Meanwhile, T.I. takes the family to New Orleans to shoot a music video with Lil' Wayne.

episodes.name: Lemonade Stand
episodes.overview: Trying to teach the kids business skills, T.I. and Nelly help them with plan. When things fall apart, one kid proves that he has his father's knack for hustling and saves the day.

episodes.name: Bust A Move
episodes.overview: It's the battle of generations as Tameka and Niq Niq face off in a competition to see who's the better dancer. Tameka turns to an unlikely source to get the edge but will it be enough. Meanwhile, Tip takes the kids to a skate park in an effort to teach Domani how to face his fears.

episodes.name: Major's Precious
episodes.overview: As Major's first day of pre-school approaches, Auntie Precious feels like it's time to move on. However, Tiny isn't quite ready to let her go and devises and plan to keep her around.

episodes.name: Etiquette Coach
episodes.overview: After Shekinah acts unprofessional during the tape of Tiny's talk show pilot, Tiny insists that Shekinah spend time with an etiquette coach.

episodes.name: City Cowboy
episodes.overview: Domani is hired for his first paid gig but when he tells Tip he's intimidated by him, T.I. has to decide whether or not to go to Domani's performance. Meanwhile, Tameka takes the kids horseback riding but Major is nervous.

episodes.name: It Takes Two to Hustle
episodes.overview: With Tip's probation coming to a close, it's time to go full hustle on promoting his new album with a big celebration bash. Tameka takes King to a meeting for his own pajama line, but the two have some creative differences.

episodes.name: A Very Harris Christmas
episodes.overview: In the Season 2 finale, the children compile their ever-growing Christmas list, but T.I. becomes concerned that they don't appreciate the work that goes into paying for their gifts.

episodes.name: Snow Hustle
episodes.overview: In the third season opener and following the release of his most recent album, T.I. decides to pack up and take the family on a winter adventure. But new to the ski slopes anything could happen with this family as they try to tackle the mountains of Big Bear, California.

episodes.name: A Major Move
episodes.overview: Major is becoming a little man and it's time for him to get his own bed but Tiny is having a hard time seeing her youngest child growing up so fast. Meanwhile T.I. must deal with another Harris child rising up too quickly as King struggles with understanding the difference between the reality of his own life and the allure of his dad's.

episodes.name: King Chaos
episodes.overview: Tameka challenges Shekinah to take care of the Harris children for a day. This gives T.I. and Tameka the opportunity to bask in quality social time together.

episodes.name: The Love Letter
episodes.overview: Tameka proposes going on a family beach vacation to the West Coast. Elsewhere, controversy swirls when a love letter is found in King's backpack.

episodes.name: Hair Therapy
episodes.overview: Shekinah is trying to move up in the hair industry, and hopes a booth at the world famous Bronner Bros. hair show will help take her there. With T.I.

episodes.name: Play Date
episodes.overview: When T.I. sees Major spending more time with his video games than his friends, T.I. decides to set up a play date for Major.

episodes.name: Hello
episodes.overview: Major asks to be in T.I.'s new music video, triggering the entire family's involvement in the project.

episodes.name: Becoming A Man
episodes.overview: With Messiah turning thirteen and entering into young adulthood, Tip encourages Messiah to go on his very first date. But in typical Harris family fashion, going solo is a no-no, so the whole family comes along for the ride.

episodes.name: Magnum, T.I.
episodes.overview: When Tip finds an incriminating text on Niq Niq's phone, he sets out with Major to get to the bottom of things. Meanwhile, Tameka encourages Shekinah to join an improv group, and sends the funniest person she knows to join her, King.

episodes.name: Family Legacy
episodes.overview: Tameka's brother visits and asks King to join his grandfather's group for one night; Tip and Deyjah take a class on baking the perfect cupcake.

episodes.name: Boot Camp
episodes.overview: Tameka convinces Shekinah that she needs home owner's boot camp; Tip is discouraged by his children's lack of basketball skills.

episodes.name: White for a Day
episodes.overview: Fed up with Shekinah always saying she wants to be white, Tameka suggests they spend the day doing things white people do. But will Shekinah see that the grass isn't always greener? Meanwhile, after discovering inappropriate pictures on his kids' social media accounts, Tip decides it's time to lay down the law.

episodes.name: Who's the Better Driver?
episodes.overview: After attending the NASCAR Daytona 500, T.I. and Tiny debate over who is the better driver and decide to have a soap box derby race to determine the answer.

episodes.name: Ringmasters
episodes.overview: The kids land their first paid gig at the circus. Elsewhere, Messiah and Domani try to launch a fashion line.

episodes.name: The Workout Video
episodes.overview: Tameka and Shekinah decide to make a unique workout video for people who don't like to work out. But with both women having different ideas, can they get it together in time? Meanwhile, Tip takes the boys to LA for some business and pleasure.

episodes.name: Back On Tour
episodes.overview: As Tip heads out for the first leg of his two month long nationwide tour with Lil Wayne, the kids aren't ready for him to go and convince him to let them come.

episodes.name: Family Fun Time
episodes.overview: In the third season finale, Tip decides to take the family to Puerto Rico for a much needed getaway. Meanwhile, Tameka meets up with Niq Niq and the OMG Girlz as they embark on their newest tour.

episodes.name: Inquiring Intel
episodes.overview: In the fourth season opener Tip decides to spend more quality time with his daughters. In an attempt to find out more information about their lives he participates in something he wouldn't normally do. But as the girls start to dish the details, is Tip ready to hear what they have to say?

episodes.name: Call 911
episodes.overview: After Messiah and Domani rescue Precious from an asthma attack, Tip takes it upon himself to make sure the kids have proper training for any emergency situation. Meanwhile, Tameka and Shekinah are struggling to communicate and head off to a retreat where the exercises put their friendship to the test.

episodes.name: Gravi-TI
episodes.overview: In an effort to teach their family about teamwork, Tip and Tameka take the kids to Space Camp where they will have to complete challenges in order to graduate. But when the kids have a difficult time working together, their mission becomes jeopardized.

episodes.name: The Contract
episodes.overview: When Tiny finally convinces T.I. to get the kids something they've wanted for years, the kids are ecstatic. But before it becomes official, the kids are put to the test to see if they are responsible enough.

episodes.name: Kindred Spirits
episodes.overview: When Russell Simmons stops by the Harris home he and Domani hit it off but when asked to make a song for Russell's new video game will Domani meet his high expectations? Meanwhile, with Niq Niq getting ready to leave the nest Tameka is having a hard time letting go and arranges a day for her and their friends to spend together to give them life advice.

episodes.name: The Rainmaker
episodes.overview: Inspired by Niq Niq's graduation and to set an example for her children, Tameka is motivated to hit the books and get her GED. Meanwhile, with his teenage son's racking up the phone bill Tip takes his oldest boys to a place where they can earn money, the hard way.

episodes.name: The Assistant
episodes.overview: As Shekinah's lifestyle picks up speed she seeks help from Tameka to try and find an assistant who can handle her growing work load and personal life, but can she find the person with the right balance of what she's looking for? With Domani spending more time in the recording studio, T.I. wants him to experience the full studio life, including pranks.

episodes.name: Make A Wish
episodes.overview: When King and Major rattle off a list of what they want to be when they grow up, including imaginary professions, Tameka decides to expose the boys to alternative options to expand their horizons. Meanwhile, Tip gives a Make-A-Wish recipient's dream come true by giving him a night he'll never forget.

episodes.name: The Rainmaker
episodes.overview: Inspired by Niq Niq's graduation and to set an example for her children, Tameka is motivated to hit the books and get her GED. Meanwhile, with his teenage son's racking up the phone bill Tip takes his oldest boys to a place where they can earn money, the hard way.

episodes.name: Kindred Spirits
episodes.overview: When Russell Simmons stops by the Harris home he and Domani hit it off but when asked to make a song for Russell's new video game will Domani meet his high expectations? Meanwhile, with Niq Niq getting ready to leave the nest Tameka is having a hard time letting go and arranges a day for her and their friends to spend together to give them life advice.

episodes.name: Harris Family Lemonade
episodes.overview: The kids decide they want to start a lemonade business and Tip and Tameka are there to help them every step of the way.

episodes.name: Get EDGE-ucated
episodes.overview: Shekinah has a new hair product for sale and she wants to promote it by enlisting Tameka's help in producing an infomercial.

episodes.name: Hypnotist
episodes.overview: Shekinah's chain smoking is driving Tameka crazy so she decides that her friend needs professional help...from a hypnotist.

episodes.name: Athletic-Off
episodes.overview: Tameka and Shekinah decide to compete in a series of athletic events to determine who's the better athlete.

episodes.name: Country Day
episodes.overview: Tameka and Shekinah decide to go out to the country for some fun but quickly learn country living is tougher that it looks. Back at home, Messiah has gotten himself into a sticky situation and asks Tip for help.

episodes.name: Home Alone
episodes.overview: Tip arrives home to find Precious out of sorts. The boys have been running rampant in the house and Precious just can't take it anymore.

episodes.name: Prank Wars
episodes.overview: Tip teaches Major the art of pranking. Niq Niq and Deyjah have Tameka take them on a day of adventure.

episodes.name: Chef T.I.
episodes.overview: Tameka has Major take her out on a pretend date so he can learn how to be a gentleman. Tip is convinced he should have his own cooking show.

episodes.name: Domani The Comedian
episodes.overview: Tip feels that Domani needs to learn about the art of comedy from one of his famous friends. Tameka holds a mother-daughter pageant.

episodes.name: Major Learns To Swim
episodes.overview: Tip thinks that Domani needs to earn his record deal. After discovering that that Major is scared of water, Tameka decides that he needs swimming lessons.

episodes.name: Harris Family Carnival
episodes.overview: The Harris family wants to raise money for a charity close to their heart and choose to put on a carnival. While Tameka is in charge of setting up the games, Tip brings Domani to a magic shop to hone in his skills.

episodes.name: Harris Thanksgiving
episodes.overview: It's Thanksgiving and in the spirit of giving back, the Harris family is making and handing out food to a local shelter. However when the kids get rowdy, Tip steps in to make sure they stay on task.

episodes.name: Are You Smarter?
episodes.overview: T.I. thinks Major may be smarter than K-Dub; Tiny and Niq Niq go on a health kick and Precious, who's recently become single, decides to join them in attempt to get herself a

episodes.name: Pesky House Guest
episodes.overview: King is inspired to set a world record and goes on a search to find one thing that he can do that no one else can.

episodes.name: Superhero
episodes.overview: T.I. is excited about his role in the "Ant-Man" movie, but King and Major aren't; and Tiny sets out to nix Niq Niq's baby fever.

episodes.name: All About Domani
episodes.overview: Once again, Domani attempts to showcase his ever growing talent as an all-around entertainer, this time as a talk show host and producer. With the help of Tiny and a few of his siblings, can he prove to T.I. that he does in fact have the creative chops to succeed?

episodes.name: Crow's Bucket List
episodes.overview: With T.I.’s crazy uncle Crow getting older, Tip sets out to help him check off the items on his bucket list, including jello wrestling! Meanwhile, the most unsuspecting Harris is pranking everyone in the house, causing confusion as the family begins to question one another.

episodes.name: A Major Baptism
episodes.overview: King and Zonnique express a desire to be baptized, to which their mother Tiny is supportive. However, the idea of Major joining in on the experience quickly comes to a halt when he once again reveals a phobia to water, leaving Tiny with the challenge of helping her youngest son overcome his fear. Meanwhile Tip has a challenge of his own, as he is tasked with preparing his old, family-friend Crow for an epic first date.

episodes.name: A Major Project
episodes.overview: With a school project due, Major asks his pops for help. But when Tip and other family members become too involved, a discouraged Major is left to do the project his own way. Meanwhile, King has written a children's book.

episodes.name: A Major Sport
episodes.overview: T.I. & Tiny decide it's time to introduce athletics into Major's life as an alternative to video games. Meanwhile, Tiny takes a meeting with a social-media comedian that has more than just a meeting in store for her.

episodes.name: Stuntin'
episodes.overview: Tameka seeks out a fun, aerobic activity for herself, Zonnique, Ms. Diane and Precious. Later, T.I. holds stunt classes in an attempt to stop his sons from damaging his home and possessions.

episodes.name: It’s A Yard Sale
episodes.overview: When the kids come to T.I. for spending money, he encourages them to get out of his pockets and find another way. Motivated, the Harris kids decide to have a garage sale, selling old things in the house, not excluding Tip’s most valued possessions. When Tip finds out his belongings are being used for profit, the kids are surprised by his actions. Meanwhile, as Zonnique begins a career on her own, she’s faced with the challenge of her first solo music video and time is not on their side.

episodes.name: Basically, He Was Framed
episodes.overview: The Harris family returns as an even bigger brood as Tip and Tameka’s baby girl, Heiress Diana, is introduced. However, the biggest news is the separation of Tip and Tameka.

episodes.name: Working Girl
episodes.overview: Now that she has separated from T.I., Tiny is ready to show that you can be a mother and a strong businesswoman at the same time. Meanwhile, Major is no longer the baby in the family and is growing up too fast.

episodes.name: Mug Shot
episodes.overview: With her new album about to be released, Niq Niq considers whether she should use her mug shot for merchandizing. Meanwhile, T.I. is looking to start over, beginning with his house, but worries as each item exceeds the budget.

episodes.name: Xscape Is in the Building
episodes.overview: Xscape set out to go on tour, but T.I. becomes uncomfortable with the situation when Tameka reveals her plan to take Heiress on the road. Later, Domani's grades are suffering, so Tip takes something away in hopes of motivating him to do better in school.

episodes.name: Domani's Platform
episodes.overview: When Domani seems indifferent after being racially profiled, T.I. helps his son realize that this action is not acceptable. Meanwhile, fearing that Tiny is lonely, Niq Niq struggles with finding alone time with her boyfriend.

episodes.name: Look At The Car, Bro
episodes.overview: After Messiah crashes T.I.'s expensive sports car, T.I. revokes Messiah's driving privileges. Tiny has a new business venture as the owner of a co-ed basketball team.

episodes.name: What I Should Have Said Was...
episodes.overview: Tip is in hot water after a radio interview in which he called Tameka a distraction. Later, Tip takes it upon himself to reach out to people he's closest with so he can clear the air.

6.name: Season 6
6.overview: In season six, T.I. and Tiny continue to work on their relationship as their kids grow older and change every day. Niq Niq is ready to leave the nest, making her the first of the Harris children to move out on their own, while Messiah prepares for his driver's license test. With Deyjah and Domani making the transition to adulthood, Tiny stops them in their tracks by showing them just how difficult being an adult can be. King's a great older brother to Major and decides to take Major under his wing. Major is no longer the baby he used to be and is looking to follow in his father's footsteps with acting.
